metadata.dc:author: Vargas, Héctor A
metadata.dc:description: Pero rodriguezi sp. nov. is described from Socoroma, at 3000 m of altitude in northern Chile, based on male holotype. This is the first species of Pero described from Chile.
metadata.dc:title: Una nueva especie de Pero Herrich-Schäffer (Lepidoptera: Geometridae) del Norte de Chile.
[A new species of Pero Herrich-Schäffer (Lepidoptera: Geometridae) from Northern Chile].
